offer.title: Air & Cabin Filter Special
offer.disclaimer: Must be presented at time of write-up. Only applicable to single cabin filter.  Some models may be slightly higher. Not valid with any other offers or in-store specials. Does not include sales tax and hazardous waste disposal fees. Not retroactive. No cash value. See dealer for details. Limit one coupon per person. Coupon does not apply to prior purchases. Void where prohibited. See your service professional at BMW of Fort Myers for details.

offer.title: Wiper Blade Replacement
offer.disclaimer: Valid only at BMW of Fort Myers. BMW wiper blades only. Please present coupon when service order is written. Taxes not included. Not valid in conjunction with other coupons or discounts. See your service professional at BMW of Fort Myers for details.

offer.title: Service Checkup
offer.details:
Reg. price $159.95. Includes:
  • Cabin air filter replacement
  • A/C system deodorizer
  • Fluids top off
  • Brake inspection
  • Tire tread depth check
  • Coolant system check
  • Multi-point inspection
